page.title: 01SUMMARY OF OUR AREA
page.content: Our square is in the county of {Somerset}near the Avon border, on top of the{Mendip Hills.}It consists of the parishes of Ashwick and Binegar, with the villages of{Oakhill, Gurney {Slade and Binegar,}and the hamlets of {Ashwick, T'other Side of the {Hill, Maesbury }and {Neighbourne. The{countryside}is gently hilly and covered in fields of grass and decidous trees seperated by hedges or mortared walls. The buildings are mostly old and of grey lime stone with red clay tiled roofs. Inhabitants of the villages leave the villages to go to work in the surrounding towns.{Employment}in the area itself comes from 1 roadstone quarry, a Brewery, a Maltings and other small rural industries. Most of the area is covered by dairy farms. Tourist attractions are few.
